Following the events of the first chapter, Sunny has achieved his dream of becoming a Royal Guard, while Moony has chosen to step away from the spotlight. However, a year later, a dark threat emerges within the seemingly impregnable walls of the Kingdom of Town's capital. The two heroes must reunite to confront a mystery that could alter the fate of the realm.Steam Store+2Steam Store+2Steam Store+2

âš”ï¸ Game Features

  • Turn-Based Combat: Engage in strategic battles with spectacular animations and unique settings.SteamDB+3Steam Store+3Steam Store+3

  • Open World Exploration: Freely explore a vast kingdom filled with secrets, side quests, and hidden locations.Steam Store

  • Character Progression: Level up, equip a wide array of weapons and armor, and learn new skills and magic through a revamped system.Steam Store+1Steam Store+1

  • Side Quests: Over 50 side quests that enrich the storyline and offer unique rewards.

  • Bounty Hunting: Defeat and capture dangerous enemies scattered across the kingdom.Steam Store+2Steam Store+2Steam Store+2

  • New Content: Discover new playable characters, face challenges in the post-game Colosseum, and much more.

Join Sunny and Moony in this new adventure to save the kingdom once again! Prepare for an unforgettable experience in the world of Il Sole e la Luna 2.
